description: Try our easy to follow Marinated Prunes & Apricots recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Marinated Prunes & Apricots Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the dried fruit into bite-sized pieces, place in a bowl, then drizzle with the dessert wine or Marsala. Leave to marinate for several hours, or overnight, so the fruit softens and absorbs the alcohol.
Decorate with orange zest and serve with dollops of ricotta.
